title: Bounty Inspectors
author: Bounty Inspectors
created_time: June 23, 2023, 09:29:58 AMLast edit: June 24, 2023, 03:38:41 AM by Bounty Inspectors
content: ⛤ WEBSITE ⛤ TELEGRAM ⛤ TWITTER ⛤ FACEBOOK ⛤  INSTAGRAM ⛤ LINKEDIN ⛤ DISCORD ⛤ Reddit  ⛤  Medium  ⛤ CMC ⛤ YOUTUBE ⛤---------------------------The project team is not satisfied with low participants .The bounty is closed due to low participation.• Pirichain Bounty campaign will run 4 weeks and managed by Bounty Inspectors management service.• By joining this campaign all participants accept that their works can be used by the team as promotional materials.• All participants must join/follow the  Official social account  of  Pirichain  above to get accepted.• using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty campaign immediately and all your account will be banned permanently.• However, we can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We areresponsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity.• We encourage everyone to do their research and due diligence before investing their time or money. Participating in this bountycampaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.1. All participants must visit Pirichain  Website and must join Pirichain's officialTelegram Group ,Telegram Channel,  Discord Channel,  Twitter,  Instagram .2. All participants must join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channeland Twitter 3. All participants must Download Pirichain  Application  and write a good review on Google play store.3. Talking about the bounty program in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty Inspectors Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently. Brand new accounts are not allowed to join.7. Participants with a minimum of 50+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join the campaigns.8. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address before registration for any campaign.9. Participants using foul language/funds will be disqualified.10. Negative Trusted Accounts may be allowed into this Campaign if the reason for red trust is libel or unjustifiable. Final Decision is at the Bounty manager's discretion if you have a massively red trusted account or acquiretoo many negatives during the campaign, you accept the risk that you might be eventually removed and your stakes voided.11. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.12. All participants have to submit their weekly reports (for social campaigns) on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculated on a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be counted. 13. Rewards will distribute  4 week after campaign ended by project team on Pirichain wallet.14. Pirichain team want to hand over 2000$ worth tokens to us at mid time of campaign. The rest of the tokens will be distributed when the campaign ended by project team Proof Of Registration Format (All participants must send 1 time):Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:Pirichain Wallet Address: Weekly Report Format:Code:Week: Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:[b]Twitter Campaign[/b]Twitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets Url:1. 2. 3. 4. 5. Tweets Url:1. 2.[b] Facebook Campaign[/b]Facebook Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Share Url:1. 2. 3. 4. 5. Posts Url:1. 2.[b] Instagram Campaign[/b]Instagram Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Share Url:1. 2. 3. 4. 5. Posts Url:1. 2.[b]Telegram Campaign[/b]Telegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Telegram posts Url:1. 2. 3. 4. 5.Twitter              30%Facebook         22%Instagram         18%Telegram          15%Video                15%Note: Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Twitter:  First 350 approved participants.Facebook:  First 300 approved participants.Instagram:  First 300 approved participants.Telegram: First 200 approved participants.Video: Top video will selected.--> Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread <--Week 1: 23th June - 29th JuneWeek 2: 30th June - 6th JulyWeek 3: 7th July - 13th July Week 4: 14th July - 20th July --> If you have any problem regarding missing stakes, please fill the form below <--Complaint FormComplaint SpreadsheetNote: Complaints will be checked once in every week.Rewards:  1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/week5. Have more than 15,001 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Pirichain's Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make 5 retweet and 2 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweet/tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use @Pirichain #Pirichain $PIRI #PIRI #Piriscan #blockchain #Newblockchain #ICO #IDO #BTC #Bitcoin hashtags every retweet/tweet.How to join:1. Join Pirichain's official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/89oiutuX9v8QVXHW8Please Read Before Join:First you can create your wallet in  Website  then you can import your wallet in the piri wallet android  Application Rewards:  1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 3001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 5,001 followers: 4 stakes/week5. Have more than 10,001 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Pirichain's  Facebook Page.2. Facebook accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make 5 Share and 2 post per week (maximum 1 share/post per day).4. Time gap between 2 share/post needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use @Pirichain #Pirichain $PIRI #PIRI #Piriscan #blockchain #Newblockchain #ICO #IDO #BTC #Bitcoin hashtags every share/post.How to join:1. Join Pirichain's official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/YJG98WMUEDVSKRZN9Please Read Before Join:First you can create your wallet in  Website  then you can import your wallet in the piri wallet android  Application Rewards:  1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 3001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 5,001 followers: 4 stakes/week5. Have more than 10,001 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Pirichain's  Instagram Page.2. Instagram accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make 5 Share and 2 post per week (maximum 1 share/post per day).4. Time gap between 2 share/post needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use @Pirichain #Pirichain $PIRI #PIRI #Piriscan #blockchain #Newblockchain #ICO #IDO #BTC #Bitcoin hashtags every share/post.How to join:1. Join Pirichain's official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/ZTvGVNtAhLUELJG19Please Read Before Join:First you can create your wallet in  Website  then you can import your wallet in the piri wallet android  Application Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | Pirichain .(Example: BountyInspectors | Pirichain)2. Replace your profile picture with  Pirichain Logo.3. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more than one project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.4. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You must interact with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign. Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.5. Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchange’s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin, Gate.io, MEXC , Bitmart etc). Posting messages on other groups won’t be counted.6. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Hashtags "#" are not allowed in the conversation.7. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.8. You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.9. You must wear Pirichain's avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.How to join:1. Join Pirichain's official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/sg8UELccCxWsX3MZ8Please Read Before Join:First you can create your wallet in  Website  then you can import your wallet in the piri wallet android  Application Rewards:  1. Normal quality :1 stake 2. Good quality: 2 stakes 3. High quality: 3 stakes Rules:  1. Each participant can send 1 video only.2. All participants must join Pirichain's  YouTube channel 3. Participants must have at least 200+ youtube subscribers,Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length.4. Participants with a minimum of 30+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join video campaigns .5. Video contents must focus on a relevant topic: project features, latest project's token updates, blockchain, etc.6. Each video must have 200 views to be eligible.7. Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.8. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered. 9. High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.10. Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.11. All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.12. Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!How to join:1. Join Pirichain's official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.2. Join Bounty Inspectors Telegram Group, Telegram Channel and Twitter.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/QLTr1ZSuTcPBevRp9Please Read Before Join:First you can create your wallet in  Website  then you can import your wallet in the piri wallet android  Application
